title: squid/kid lulu!
body:
this splatoon game gave me an idea for a skin.
http://2new1.fjcdn.com/gifs/Pool+party+lulu_4c7b12_5575325.gif <relevant.gif

replies.body: This gif is fantastic.

Hey! I just want you to let you know that gif is made by me 
here is the link to the original post on tumblr http://chimidolly.tumblr.com/post/121165984944

i found it on fj.
i wasnt taking credit.
i just thought that this should be a skin.

I like how your getting downvoted when you literally did nothing wrong.

These boards get more hateful and toxic everyday.

It's a shame really :/

i like how she did nothing to prove that she is the original artist beyond "it was me"
i mean it could be just some random troll.
It is a skin. It's on surrenderat20, the skin is called "Pool Party Lulu".
no1care
So by your logic, if someone were to take your account here and change everything and call it their own, you would not care, right?
if they changed everything it wouldnt be mine
Okay, someone takes your account and leaves it the same, but calls it their own. Still okay with that?
Because stealing art from an artist and calling it yours is totally cool right?
They didn't claim it as theirs and they have an arrow pointing to the watermark.  They should have said whose it was, but I still doubt they were trying to claim the .gif as their own work.
The arrow is clearly just pointing at the .gif in general. As is says "<relevant.gif"  also they say, "this splatoon game gave **ME** an idea for a skin." implying it was their work.

Implying that they had an idea.  Then they said that the picture they presented was relevant to their idea.  If they had made the picture they wouldn't say it was a relevant gif, they would say it is a gif of the idea.

If you instantly thought that this person was trying to claim credit for the art then I don't know what to say to calm you down because when I saw it I instantly wondered where they found the art.  Don't just assume because someone didn't name the artist for something that they are trying to maliciously take credit for the art.

hey can I have your account since you don't care.
I'll change your name to d1ckbutt.
cute gif

Please tell me this is going to be implemented into her skin.

I don't play Lulu.

But I will buy that skin and main the ever-loving _hell_ out of her if this were implemented!
I think this is more or less the recall animation.

yo little man!
I would like you to atleast send the credit to the real artist (guess what, it me :0 )  and don't claim it as your own, because let me tell you that's really rude from your part, you should be a good person and respect other people's work!! 

you can use it as your phone back ground, skype picture or post it here w/e comes to your mind, but I would apreciate if you could credit me instead of claming it as you own.
the least thing I want it's a drama and I could simply avoid that by reporting this post if we are still in disagree, but I want you to know that it really feels bad when you steal other people's work.

> the least thing I want it's a drama and I could simply avoid that by reporting this post if we are still in disagree, but I want you to know that it really feels bad when you steal other people's work.

understand this. i was browsing fj and came across this.
decided to put it on here.
never did i say this was my art.
i had no idea who made it.
if you click on the gif source it shows as an fj content image.
the fjer didnt credit anyone so if you wanna bi tch and moan talk to them.
cuz i sure as hell didnt do this purposely trying to edge you out.
i would like my apology now.

When you posted this .gif, you said that the Splatoon game gave YOU an idea, quote "the splatoon game gave ME and idea for a Lulu skin," therefore claiming that it was your idea/drawing in the first place. You don't deserve an apology, you are not the victim. Not to mention the fact that if you found it without a source on FJ, it's easy to right click the image, search google for it, and find the correct source BEFORE you repost it, so no, you're not excuse just because you found it, you are just as guilty as the original FJ poster.

No need to be so harsh on him/her, at least now more people know about it and many people like it, and it should make you happy, am I wrong? {{summoner:31}} Don't be {{item:3751}} at others just for this.
That is seriously adorable. The gif.
thank you so much :)
Varus is just not giving a s**t.
If this isn't a quote for the pool party skin... i'm gonna be disappoint.

Make it a /toggle

Im a kid now
/toggle
im a squid now
/toggle
im a kid now

Like Neon Strike Vi and her sunglasses?

For the love of the based Gaben/Rito God(s), PLEASE!!

I would recommend not stealing artists work without crediting them. The watermark is there so it was kind of foolish to do this in the first place.
Hhhmmmm, I have seen this GIF before... I hope you aren't claiming you made this unless you actually did.
www.chimidolly.tumblr.com is the original artist. Don't know why they didn't credit her.
that's me
I am now a fan.
Yea to bad it's not your art/idea http://chimidolly.tumblr.com <--- original artist
Tbh, Squid Lulu reminds me of Squidgirl.
You're a kid now. You're a squid now. You're a kid. You're a squid. You're a kid. You're a squid.
SHE'S A SQUID SHE'S A KID SHE'S A SQUID SHE'S A KID SHE'S A SQUID NOOOOOOW

> [{quoted}](name=troytech,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=8duHW8x8,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-06-11T15:20:12.183+0000)

I was waiting for this reference.
So fantastic.
The cuteness is off the charts!
Im A Squid Now B)
But...she's not a kid...  She's a yordle... ;.;

Yordles can be kids too.

I mean, come on, even goats have kids.

She's not a kid, though.  She's actually a couple of centuries old, at least...

Fae Glade kept her from physically aging/dying as much as she normally would have.

Hm, and this is where magic gets real. Did she experience the passage of time mentally, or did time just pass that much faster?

At least she's a kid at heart, physically too. Even if her mind/soul technically isn't?

She just sort of lost track of time.  Time doesn't work the same way in the Glade and, although the lore never specifically states it, I think it's safe to assume that the Glade is a place free from time (at least in a sense).  So, she didn't perceive the time passing because she can't perceive something that doesn't exist in that plane.  She just randomly remembered, "Oh, I don't live here, do I?  I should probably go back to Bandle City..."  Then, whoops, she's been gone like two or three hundred years...  I imagine it was kinda like how you say to yourself, "I'm gonna play for like an hour or two," and then look at the clock and realize that it's been like eight...

She's a kid at heart in the sense that she's kinda insane and has no idea how to act "properly" and instead just does whatever she wants because WHIMSY!!!!!!~!  And in the sense that she wasn't socialized "properly" so she's a clean slate as far as societal norms and expectations go.  I think, physically speaking, she's an adult.  Like, it never specifies her age when she went into the Glade or how long she was out before she went the the Institute of War.  Judging from her looks, she looks like an adult yordle...
